title: couchbase

<!--
     THIS FILE IS AUTOGENERATED!

> This component is experimental and therefore subject to change or removal outside of major version releases.
\{\{style="warning"\}\}
Use a Couchbase instance as a cache.

Introduced in version 4.12.0.





## Fields
| Field | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:------|:---------|:-------------|
| `url` | `string` | `` | Couchbase connection string. |
| `username` | `string` | `` | Username to connect to the cluster. |
| `password` | `string` | `` | Password to connect to the cluster. |
| `bucket` | `string` | `` | Couchbase bucket. |
| `collection` | `string` | `"_default"` | Bucket collection. |
| `transcoder` | `string` | `"legacy"` | Couchbase transcoder to use. |
| `timeout` | `string` | `"15s"` | Operation timeout. |
| `default_ttl` | `string` | `` | An optional default TTL to set for items, calculated from the moment the item is cached. |
